name: Joe's Requiem
description:
Short and Sweet - Joe's Requiem is the free prologue to "A ride with Joe".

You follow Agent Pierce, a Lambdacorp Special operative who is going to be the first person to travel between dimensions. After landing in a universe littered with evil versions of Shoebill Storks, Pierce is intercepted by the interdimensional superbeing "Joe" and his supervisor the Railroad Man. Will you run from Joe or accept his transcendental offerings? It's up to you.
